message.preparation: &3You have 15 seconds to prepare for launch!
message.border-shrink: &cThe border begins to shrink! Run to the center of the map!
message.border-end: &cThe border arrived to the center. The pvp will be enabled in 5 seconds!

message.first-place-armor: %player% &7reached the center first! He just got a&c diamond armor&7 !
